description: Gets details for a backend storage resource.

parameters.name: BackendEnvironmentName
parameters.description: The name of the backend environment.

parameters.name: ResourceName
parameters.description: The name of the storage resource.

nested_items.name: BackendEnvironmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the backend environment.

nested_items.name: ResourceConfig
nested_items.description: The resource configuration for the backend storage resource.

nested_items.name: BucketName
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: Imported
nested_items.description: Returns True if the storage resource has been imported.

nested_items.name: Permissions
nested_items.description: The authorization configuration for the storage S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: Authenticated
nested_items.description: Lists all authenticated user read, write, and delete permissions for your S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: UnAuthenticated
nested_items.description: Lists all unauthenticated user read, write, and delete permissions for your S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: ServiceName
nested_items.description: The name of the storage service.

nested_items.name: ResourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the storage resource.
